issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Backport to branch-1 -- HIVE-12894 Detect whether ORC is reading from ACID table correctly for Schema Evolution

comments.body:
Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12783710/HIVE-12906.1-branch1.patch

{color:green}SUCCESS:{color} +1 due to 2 test(s) being added or modified.

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 589 failed/errored test(s), 9366 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
